title: Bug 116564: The title of hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options', now it changes with settings.
description: The title of hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options', now it changes with settings.
OB: Clicking on 'OK' and reopening the hyperlink builder results in its title becoming 'www.actuate.com'.
EB: The title of the hyperlink builder should remain as 'Hyperlink Options' after clicking 'OK' and reopening the hyperlink builder.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the hyperlink builder.
2. Click on 'OK'.
3. Reopen the hyperlink builder.

Expected result: The title of the hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options'.
